name: zneoALTV
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd)), wne(c0, c1))

stmt.origin: sylan2(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd), wne(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c1, ceven)))
stmt.pretty: sylan2(c0 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ Odd, c0 ≠ c1, ¬ c1 ∈ Even)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd)), wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c1, codd), wn(wcel(c1, ceven)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c1, ceven))), wne(c0, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Odd)→ c0 ≠ c1)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Odd → ¬ c1 ∈ Even)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ Even)→ c0 ≠ c1)

-| wi(wcel(c1, codd), wn(wcel(c1, ceven)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c1, ceven))), wne(c0, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Odd)→ c0 ≠ c1)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Odd → ¬ c1 ∈ Even)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ Even)→ c0 ≠ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd)), wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c1, ceven))), wne(c0, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Odd)→ c0 ≠ c1)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ Even)→ c0 ≠ c1)

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c1, ceven))), wne(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd)), wne(c0, c1))

comment: No even integer equals an odd integer (i.e. no integer can be both even and odd). Exercise 10(a) of [Apostol] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.) (Revised by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)
